title: Microlearning Course for Enhancing Wine Science and Viticulture Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural science or food science knowledge
context.additional_context: A competency-based education program conducted in mobile environments for learners preparing to enter the wine industry

learning_goals: Learners can explain core theories of winemaking and viticulture (fermentation science, viticulture, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate collaboration and problem-solving competencies through team-based virtual vineyard simulation projects
Employment readiness is evaluated through portfolio creation based on industry requirements analysis
Digital literacy and self-assessment skills are improved through the use of mobile assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
